channel.title: Personal Thoughts on Ydn's personal blog.
channel.description: Recent content in Personal Thoughts on Ydn's personal blog.

item.title: The Books I Read Recently
item.description: To be honest, I am not kind of such a book worm nor a book enthusiast. I read books occasionaly, when I am tired in front of my computers or I want to refresh my mind for a while. At the end of this year, I want to share my thoughts related to some books which I have read during this year. ‘Origin’ written by Dan Brown I read Dan Brown’s works since Digital Fortress.

item.title: Hello World
item.description: Hello, I will keep you as my first footprint in this site #!/usr/bin/env python print('hello-world!')
